Pre-Game Insights: South Africa's batting line-up has struggled while chasing in ODIs this year.
Aiden Markram said South Africa will approach chases by trying to'set a target' and then adjust their approach based on the situation.
Markram emphasized the importance of intensity and standards in their game against Bangladesh.
South Africa found out early in this tournament what an upset feels like, and they would want to prove that their batters can shine under pressure too.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match against Bangladesh will be played in the unforgiving weather of Mumbai.
Wankhede could provide a flat deck with short boundaries, making it challenging for South Africa to chase a stiff target.
South Africa went down 2-1 in their last ODI series against Bangladesh at home in March 2022, and their two losses to Bangladesh in World Cups came while batting second.
